TypeSignature.Value: public interface IResultSetMetaData : IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Sql.IWrapper
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IResultSetMetaData implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Sql.IWrapper, class System.IDisposable
type IResultSetMetaData = interface interface IWrapper interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties of the columns in a ResultSet object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns number of columns contained in the associated result set.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if there is a database error.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that a column does not allow NULL values.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that a column allows NULL values.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that the nullability of a column's values is unknown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCatalogName(int32 column) cil managed

Docs.param: the first column is 1, the second is 2, ...
Docs.summary: Gets the designated column's table's catalog name.
Docs.returns: the name of the catalog for the table in which the given column appears or "" if not applicable

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if there is a database error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetColumnClassName(int32 column) cil managed

Docs.param: the first column is 1, the second is 2, ...
Docs.summary: Returns the fully-qualified name of the Java class whose instances are manufactured if the method <code>ResultSet.
Docs.returns: the fully-qualified name of the class in the Java programming language that would be used by the method ResultSet.getObject to retrieve the value in the specified column. This is the class name used for custom mapping.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if there is a database error.
